name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Dedicated and results-oriented Senior Sales Engineer with 9+ years of expertise in delivering technical solutions tailored to customer needs. Proven ability to manage projects effectively and oversee the entire lifecycle of technical proposals. Skilled in leveraging extensive knowledge in **Elektrotechnik** and **Projektmanagement** to craft compelling bids and ensure customer satisfaction. Adept at active listening and fluent in both German and English, facilitating clear communication with clients. Original strengths include a strong technical background as a .NET Full Stack Developer, with experience in microservices architecture and distributed systems utilizing technologies such as **Apache Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Redis**, alongside proficient use of **ReactJS**, **NextJS**, **.NET**, and **C#**.
